text:
The Kottur Police have arrested Dhanasekar, his father Ramachandran, mother Kokilavani, and brother Rameshkumar on charges of abetting the suicide of his wife Deepa (27).

The woman jumped to death in a farm well in Samathur, near Pollachi. The police, who registered a case, probed the death and then arrested the four based on a suicide note the woman had left. She had complained of harassment by her husband and in-laws.
title: Four arrested
